subject: RE: [junit] testing servlets  code
msgSnippet: It can be an interesting experience to select your C: drive, choose Find ... files and search for occurrences of java.exe. ...
messageBody:
RE: [junit] testing servlets code

It can be an interesting experience to select your C:\ drive,
choose Find ... files and search for occurrences of
java.exe.

    -----Original Message-----
    From:   Dinwiddie, George [SMTP:George.Dinwiddie@...]
    Sent:   Thursday, March 01, 2001 10:03 AM
    To:     'junit@yahoogroups.com'
    Subject:        RE: [junit] testing servlets  code

    Try also giving an explicit path to the java interpreter.
    I've run into problems before when another java.exe existed
    earlier in the path.

     - George

    -----Original Message-----
    From: Erik Meade [mailto:emeade@...]
    Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 12:18 AM
    To: junit@yahoogroups.com
    Subject: RE: [junit] testing servlets code


    Vin,

    You might want to try a different version of java.

    --
    Erik Meade             emeade@...
    Senior Consultant      Object Mentor, Inc.
    http://www.junit.org

    > -----Original Message-----
    > From: vin san [mailto:vinsanvin@...]
    > Sent: Sunday, February 25, 2001 10:05 PM
    > To: junit@yahoogroups.com
    > Subject: [junit] testing servlets code
    >
    >
    >
    >
    > Hello
    >
    >  I have a small problem , I have compiled  example
    > program
    >
    > Of the servlet eg:/ TestSampleServlet  and
    > SampleServlet .
    >
    > Compilation goes on fine .
    >
    > But when I run   TestSampleServlet.class  file  the
    > following error
    >
    > Is displayed .
    >
    >  This program has performed an illegal operation and
    > it will shut down 
    >
    >
    > JAVA caused an invalid page fault in
    >
    > module <unknown> at 0000:b00ce191.
    >
    > Registers:
    > EAX=cd65d000 CS=0137 EIP=b00ce191 EFLGS=00010206
    > EBX=0000c200 SS=013f ESP=0590f76c EBP=00000000
    > ECX=0590faa8 DS=013f ESI=c0f37000 FS=6e57
    > EDX=0590faa8 ES=013f EDI=c0f37000 GS=0000
    > Bytes at CS:EIP:
    > 8b 75 18 8b 58 50 85 f6 74 45 3b 5e 08 72 40 8b
    > Stack dump:
    > 0590faa8 c0f37000 802f321c 0000c200 b00cdb4f c0f37000
    > 00004000 84643e70 0590f9d0 0000c200 802f321c bff7126a
    > c0f37000 00000000 817a73e2 0590f868
    >
    > pls.. help me
    >
    > thanking you
    >
    >
    >
    > vinsan

    >
    >
    >
